sentence.text: The children go to school by car every day.
sentence.textCn: 孩子们每天都乘小汽车去上学。

sentence.text: but today, they are going to school on foot.
sentence.textCn: 但今天，他们正步行去上学。

sentence.text: Mrs. Sawyer usually stays at home in the morning.
sentence.textCn: 索耶夫人通常是上午呆在家里。

sentence.text: but this morning, she is going to the shops.
sentence.textCn: 但今天上午，她正去商店买东西。

sentence.text: In the afternoon, Mrs. Sawyer usually drinks tea in the living room.
sentence.textCn: 下午，索耶夫人通常是在客厅里喝茶。

sentence.text: But this afternoon, she is drinking tea in the garden.
sentence.textCn: 但今天下午，她正在花园里喝茶。

sentence.text: In the evening, the children usually do their homework.
sentence.textCn: 晚上，孩子们通常做作业。

sentence.text: but this evening, they are not doing their homework.
sentence.textCn: 但今天晚上，他们没做作业。

sentence.text: At the moment, they are playing in the garden.
sentence.textCn: 此刻，他们正在花园里玩。

sentence.text: Mr. Sawyer usually reads his newspaper at night.
sentence.textCn: 索耶先生通常是在晚上看报。

sentence.text: But he's not reading his newspaper tonight.
At the moment, he's reading an interesting book.
sentence.textCn: 此刻，他正在看一本有趣的书。
